name: Untitled space game (spacegamedev)
description:
This is a gamer where you command crew of a spaceship. It's still in early stage but there is basic gameplay loop.

How to play:

  • left click to select crew member
  • right click do give them orders
  • more detailed orders require you to draft crew using a button in selection window
  • ESC button can quit most menus
  • TAB switches between active ships

Example gameplay:

  1. Select your crew members on by one and give them order to pick up weapon.
  2. Go to duty menu and select duty for pilot controls.
  3. Got to system menu and travel to nearest station.
  4. Choose a mission from contracts menu at the station.
  5. Return shuttle to the mothership and choose unload to return crew and cargo to main ship.
  6. You will see the target in system view or galaxy view if it's in another system. Fly to the target to engage mission.
  7. Depending on a mission you must either get target item on the map or ids from eliminated enemies.
  8. Return to station to complete the mission.
